SELECT_DATE_RANGE.sql: SELECT a.id, a.bountyId, a.type, a.url, a.description, a.isPrimacyOfImpact, b.updatedDate FROM assets a JOIN bounties b ON a.bountyId = b.bountyId WHERE b.updatedDate BETWEEN :start_date AND :end_date;
SELECT_DATE_RANGE.description: Show data for targets updated between specified dates

TARGETS_ONCHAIN_COUNT.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM assets a JOIN bounties b ON a.bountyId = b.bountyId WHERE a.type = 'smart_contract' AND a.url NOT LIKE '%github%';

TARGETS_TYPES_COUNT.sql: SELECT type, COUNT(*) as count FROM assets GROUP BY type;
TARGETS_TYPES_COUNT.description: Count all types of bug bounties

TARGETS_NETWORK_COUNT.sql: SELECT network, COUNT(*) as count FROM targets GROUP BY network ORDER BY count DESC;
TARGETS_NETWORK_COUNT.description: Count all networks of target addresses and order by count
